Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Longport in 1964...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/1966, off Lucio Salvador (Ash)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/14/1966, off Andrew Keller (TRO)...
Hit 3 homeruns against Pontiac, driving in 5 runs on 8/25/1967...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1968, hitting .337 with 5 HR, 16 RBI...
Was selected to the 1970 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Syracuse, driving in 6 runs on 9/13/1972...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1973, hitting .545 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Pontiac on 8/24/1973...
Hit 3 homeruns against Pontiac, driving in 6 runs on 8/24/1973...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1973, hitting .533 with 6 HR, 14 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1973, hitting .319 with 8 HR, 21 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Boston (UBA) on 10/2/1973...
Drove in 6 runs against Penn on 6/12/1974...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1974, hitting .400 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Was selected to the 1974 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1974, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Coney Island on 8/27/1974...
Won Outstanding Batter Award in 1974, hitting .266 with 42 HR, 119 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Capital City on 7/13/1975...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1975, hitting .407 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 2/16/1976 to a 7-year deal worth $9,576,000 per year...
Traded from Capital City to Longport on 2/18/1976 (Going to LP: SS C. Caine. Going to CC: P C. Brock)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Pontiac on 9/16/1976...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Gashouse on 9/9/1977...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1978, hitting .481 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Had 2000th career hit on 8/20/1979, off Mickey Tussler (WT)...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 2/11/1982 to a 1-year deal worth $655,500 per year...
